heroSection.description: A striking logo featuring a stylized flame design in shades of blue and orange, with the company name 'Rusty Bottoms' and tagline 'Water Heater Replacement' prominently displayed.
heroSection.callToAction: Upgrade your water heater with Rusty Bottoms' expert replacement services. Contact us today for a free quote.

heroSection.description: A detailed diagram illustrating the inner workings of a tankless water heater, including components like the heat exchanger, burner, and gas valve.
heroSection.callToAction: Discover the efficiency and space-saving benefits of tankless water heaters. Let Rusty Bottoms guide you through the installation process.

heroSection.description: A close-up view of a modern water heater tank, showcasing its sleek design and energy-efficient features.
heroSection.callToAction: Enhance your home's hot water supply with Rusty Bottoms' top-of-the-line water heater replacements. Schedule your installation now.

aboutUsSection.description: A behind-the-scenes look at a water heater installation, with various plumbing components and tools neatly arranged.
aboutUsSection.relevance: This image demonstrates Rusty Bottoms' expertise and attention to detail when it comes to water heater replacements, highlighting their professionalism and commitment to quality workmanship.

aboutUsSection.description: An open utility closet revealing a newly installed water heater, along with a ladder and other equipment used by Rusty Bottoms' technicians.
aboutUsSection.relevance: This image showcases Rusty Bottoms' ability to work in tight spaces and navigate challenging installation environments, ensuring a seamless water heater replacement experience for their customers.

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Vincent Burton
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Great work, great prices and wonderful work ethic. Everything discussed was taken care of. No hidden markup fees and great response time.  I definitely would recommend to anyone needing replacement.  Very nice installation process.  Thanks again for your honesty and hard work.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Rusty Bottoms

aboutUs: At Rusty Bottoms, we are a team of highly skilled and experienced plumbing professionals dedicated to providing top-notch service to our local community. With our extensive knowledge and specialized expertise, we tackle even the most complex plumbing issues with ease. From routine maintenance to emergency repairs, our team is equipped to handle all your residential and commercial plumbing needs.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Experience the peace of mind that comes with choosing a trusted and reliable local plumbing company.
sellingPoints: Rapid response times for emergency situations, ensuring your plumbing issues are resolved promptly.
Highly trained and certified technicians with a deep understanding of the latest plumbing techniques and technologies.
Commitment to using only the highest-quality materials and equipment, ensuring long-lasting and efficient solutions.
